Barry was born in Armonk, New York as the fourth child of David and Marion Barry.
Barry earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in English from the State University of New York at Purchase in 1981 and a Master of Divinity from the San Francisco Theological Seminary in 1993.
Sam Barry is a musician and author in the San Francisco Bay Area.
He also plays with the Rock Bottom Remainders, an all-author rock band founded by Goldmark in 1992.
